text: @realDonaldTrump TRANSITION TO YOUR REMOVAL COME JANUARY 2021, for your grave disregard for American lives (approaching 100K #coronavirus deaths) due to your INCOMPETENCE in trying to lead a NATIONAL PANDEMIC RESPONSE, during which time you continued to praise China Prez Xi! @mmpadellan @maddow
